page.shortlink: api client api a5 controlbar disclosure object

property.name: type
property.description: The type of disclosure. The value can be "static" (the default) or "template". A "static" disclosure will inject the HTML into the disclosure when the control bar is created. A "template" disclosure will be redrawn frequently and can use control bar items by placing item names between square brackets. For example "[help]" would inject the item named "help".

property.name: html
property.description: The HTML to put in the disclosure.

property.name: className
property.description: The class name to put on the disclosure. If not specified, the default class name from A5.ControlBar.disclosure.defaults.className will be used.

property.name: onInitialize
property.description: Event that fires when the disclosure is initially created.

argument.name: element
argument.description: The DOM element for the disclosure.

property.name: onBeforeDraw
property.description: Event that fires before the disclosure is drawn when the disclosure is of the "template" type.

argument.name: element
argument.description: The DOM element for the disclosure.

property.name: onDraw
property.description: Event that fires when the disclosure is drawn when the disclosure is of the "template" type.

argument.name: element
argument.description: The DOM element for the disclosure.

property.name: onSize
property.description: Event that fires when the disclosure is sized.

argument.name: element
argument.description: The DOM element for the disclosure.

property.name: onShow
property.description: Event that fires when the disclosure is shown.

argument.name: element
argument.description: The DOM element for the disclosure.

property.name: onShowComplete
property.description: Event that fires when the disclosure finishes being shown.

argument.name: element
argument.description: The DOM element for the disclosure.

property.name: onHide
property.description: Event that fires when the disclosure is hidden.

argument.name: element
argument.description: The DOM element for the disclosure.
